name: drngmgp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: -| wceq(c1, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))))

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c0, crg))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ Ring)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cgrp))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cdr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ DivRing → c1 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ DivRing ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ Grp))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cgrp))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cdr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ DivRing → c1 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ DivRing ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ Grp))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cdr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
-| wceq(c1, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ DivRing ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ Grp))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
⊣ c1 =((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](c2 \ { c3 }))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
-| wceq(c1, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ DivRing → c1 ∈ Grp)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
⊣ c1 =((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](c2 \ { c3 }))

comment: A division ring contains a multiplicative group. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2011.)
